## Outlier function
```{r}
outlier <- function(x){
  v <- quantile(x)
  one <- v[[2]]
  two <- v[[4]]
  for (k in 0:length(x)){
    if (one<x[k])
      return(TRUE)
    if (x[k]<two)
      return(TRUE)
    }
  else (return(FALSE))
  }
```
